metadata.title: CVE-2018-18484 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in cp-demangle.c in GNU libiberty, as distributedin GNU Binutils 2.31. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++ demanglingfunctions provided by libiberty, and there is a stack consumption problemcaused by recursive stack frames: cplus_demangle_type,d_bare_function_type, d_function_type.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3').
